name: sample-docker-app
description: A sample ActyxOS docker app that sends pings and displays them

scripts.build:image:x86_64: npm run build && docker build -f Dockerfile -t sample-docker-app-x86_64 .
scripts.build:image:aarch64: npm run build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -f Dockerfile -t sample-docker-app-aarch64 --load .
